caption:
This photograph captures a busy street scene, highlighting urban transit. The central focus of the image is a public bus, prominently featuring the number 843 and labeled as an express service on the route to "6th Avenue." The bus is a traditional model from around the mid-20th century, painted in a reddish color with a cream upper body.

The bus is framed by several cars, blurred in the foreground and background, suggesting the hustle and bustle typical of a busy city street. The cars appear to be models from around the 1960s or 1970s, judging from their design. These vehicles give the photograph a somewhat vintage feel.

The image is slightly unfocused, contributing to a sense of motion and activity. The lighting and shadows suggest it may be either early morning or late afternoon, adding to the atmosphere of a typical urban commute.

There are no clear views of people, but the presence of a bus driver is implied behind the windshield of the bus. The overall composition conveys a sense of daily life and public transportation in an urban environment during a past era.
title: Express bus on Queens Boulevard, Queens
